main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="forever" id="zb2{p~~s6d^8.O%}g:l4" x="20" y="20"></block>
  <block type="input_set_loud_sound_threshold" id="GcQL6j[kFmePAxrP=h~$" disabled="true" x="270" y="70">
    <value name="value">
      <shadow type="math_number_minmax" id="-ff!sKUFSlj,p]BT_e{W">
        <mutation min="1" max="100" label="Value"></mutation>
        <field name="SLIDER">0</field>
      </shadow>
    </value>
  </block>
  <block type="input_on_loud_sound" id="EYSTV.rUE{$[^rvMOMv7" x="210" y="170">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="music_play_sound" id="(gY5t*S:h.eBiqMiBzeU">
        <value name="sound">
          <shadow type="music_sounds" id="4FdvWoTh`^spUfE4bef9">
            <field name="name">Sounds.Wawawawaa</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="input_on_light_condition_changed" id="0^|}*f;eDNq77nk)R/[+" x="470" y="170">
    <field name="condition">LightCondition.Dark</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="music_play_note" id="`zR.;DImUP?)W5`YdR`a">
        <value name="note">
          <shadow type="device_note" id="mZ#:)CWrp0B(hh^zY/M8">
            <field name="note">175</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <value name="duration">
          <shadow type="device_beat" id="*l9#8Xjsq{dGF@Ekx9#d">
            <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Half</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="music_play_note" id="3PwtN?TvI=[#U{[1k(@H">
            <value name="note">
              <shadow type="device_note" id="*VY~jeAUP.j{;7I.I8H=">
                <field name="note">185</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <value name="duration">
              <shadow type="device_beat" id="O}Yt+bylVzeW{SnMb!V@">
                <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Half</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_gesture_event" id="w36[s+sc;oZ/i[V*Cxk-" x="90" y="350">
    <field name="NAME">Gesture.Shake</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="music_play_note" id="%AkL=TPqOw]^8cX=Tkx#">
        <value name="note">
          <shadow type="device_note" id="DCqj_wO?p=/?34kc61!0">
            <field name="note">262</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <value name="duration">
          <shadow type="device_beat" id="vUKZ_E6SQ]QK.QpY{L3M">
            <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Half</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="music_play_note" id=")E0%B3r]u3Q=CnS[.3.?">
            <value name="note">
              <shadow type="device_note" id="ev*%_*molnPsa{WF-aQ9">
                <field name="note">349</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <value name="duration">
              <shadow type="device_beat" id="lSpf+(G6PW`,Rew7|GO?">
                <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Half</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="music_play_note" id="w@Eeb?2`Ax*JKo/hat(7">
                <value name="note">
                  <shadow type="device_note" id="$$MB~5H475jL3^1|CBsq">
                    <field name="note">392</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <value name="duration">
                  <shadow type="device_beat" id="`h$Z3x_m3AI[Fu,eP-av">
                    <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Half</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
